text.section:
A person who commits a willful violation of this subtitle:
is guilty of a misdemeanor;
is subject, on conviction, to a fine not exceeding three times the value of the total gross amount of funds solicited by the public safety solicitor or imprisonment not exceeding 1 year or both; and
shall forfeit to the Secretary of State the bond required in § 6-5A-03 of this subtitle.

A person who commits a grossly negligent violation of this subtitle:
is guilty of a misdemeanor;
is subject, on conviction, to a fine not exceeding the gross amount of funds solicited by the public safety solicitor or liability for restitution that the court determines or both; and
shall forfeit to the Secretary of State the bond required in § 6-5A-03 of this subtitle.
